{{cpp/title|strcoll}}
{{cpp/string/byte/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=cstring|
int strcoll( const char* lhs, const char* rhs );
}}

Compares two null-terminated byte strings according to the current locale as defined by the {{lc|LC_COLLATE}} category.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|pointers to the null-terminated byte strings to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
* Negative value if {{c|lhs}} is ''less than'' (precedes) {{c|rhs}}.
* {{c|0}} if {{c|lhs}} is ''equal to'' {{c|rhs}}.
* Positive value if {{c|lhs}} is ''greater than'' (follows) {{c|rhs}}.

===Notes===
{{cpp/locale/collate/collation_note}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;clocale&gt;
#include &lt;cstring&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::setlocale(LC_COLLATE, "cs_CZ.utf8");
    // Alternatively, ISO-8859-2 (a.k.a. Latin-2)
    // may also work on some OS:
    // std::setlocale(LC_COLLATE, "cs_CZ.iso88592");

    const char* s1 = "hrnec";
    const char* s2 = "chrt";

    std::cout &lt;&lt; "In the Czech locale: ";
    if (std::strcoll(s1, s2) &lt; 0)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; s1 &lt;&lt; " before " &lt;&lt; s2 &lt;&lt; '\n';
    else
        std::cout &lt;&lt; s2 &lt;&lt; " before " &lt;&lt; s1 &lt;&lt; '\n';

    std::cout &lt;&lt; "In lexicographical comparison: ";
    if (std::strcmp(s1, s2) &lt; 0)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; s1 &lt;&lt; " before " &lt;&lt; s2 &lt;&lt; '\n';
    else
        std::cout &lt;&lt; s2 &lt;&lt; " before " &lt;&lt; s1 &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
In the Czech locale: hrnec before chrt
In lexicographical comparison: chrt before hrnec
}}
